column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I would give them 4.5 stars if Yelp allowed it. I subtracted a half point because the price for ramen is pretty high
column2: My dish was about $10  and his was about $12. I know we were eating in Midtown and the rent  is high
column3: but ramen is not meant to be expensive
column4: and our meal ran about $50 with a good tip.. Overall
column7: if I can't find a comparable menu in Chinatown
column8: a little closer to where I live.
